Easy.Q: If there are 8 zebras and 3 run off to graze, how many zebras are left?
If there are 6 monkeys and 2 climb a tree, how many monkeys are left on the ground?
If there are 10 parrots and 4 fly away, how many parrots are left?
If there are 7 lions and 3 leave the pride, how many lions are left?
If there are 9 turtles and 4 crawl into the water, how many turtles are left on the shore?
If there are 5 giraffes and 1 moves to another tree, how many giraffes are left?
If there are 6 deer and 2 hide in the forest, how many deer are left?
If there are 8 elephants and 5 walk away, how many elephants are left?
If there are 10 flamingos and 6 fly off, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 12 snakes and 7 slither away, how many snakes are left?

Medium.Q: If there are 18 zebras and 9 run off to graze, how many zebras are left?
If there are 20 leopards and 8 chase after prey, how many leopards are left?
If there are 25 flamingos and 10 fly away, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 30 antelopes and 12 run into the bushes, how many antelopes are left?
If there are 22 crocodiles and 7 dive underwater, how many crocodiles are left?
If there are 24 rhinos and 6 wander off, how many rhinos are left?
If there are 28 camels and 14 move to another oasis, how many camels are left?
If there are 26 penguins and 11 slide into the water, how many penguins are left?
If there are 19 buffalo and 8 run into the woods, how many buffalo are left?
If there are 21 foxes and 9 sneak into their dens, how many foxes are left?

Hard.Q: If there are 100 gazelles and 45 leap away, how many gazelles are left?
If there are 150 flamingos and 75 fly away, how many flamingos are left?
If there are 200 tigers and 88 move to another jungle, how many tigers are left?
If there are 300 elephants and 125 migrate to another area, how many elephants are left?
If there are 275 giraffes and 100 wander off, how many giraffes are left?
If there are 400 monkeys and 150 swing away into the trees, how many monkeys are left?
If there are 500 deer and 200 run into the forest, how many deer are left?
If there are 450 seals and 225 dive into the ocean, how many seals are left?
If there are 600 wolves and 300 run into the mountains, how many wolves are left?
If there are 800 kangaroos and 400 hop away, how many kangaroos are left?
